message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth significantly more than its face value. I believe it could greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. I am offering it to you for $150, which is a special introductory price considering your potential long-term value to our community. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
